mapper.insert: insert into style values (style_seq.nextval, #{image1}, #{image2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image5, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content}, #{style}, 0, 0, sysdate, #{product_number1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{product_number2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{product_number3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{product_number4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{member_id})
